metadata.description: The origin of Dark Shadows, finally revealed!  How did Barnabas Collins become a bloodthirsty vampire?  What tragedies befell the Collins family through the generations?  All it took was one night of weakness, and Barnabas cursed his family -- and himself -- forever!  The twisted tale of one of pop culture's most iconic and enduring vampires begins here!  This issue features exclusive digital content.
metadata.name: Dark Shadows: Year One
